title: Fabric API
description: Lightweight and modular API providing common hooks and intercompatibility measures utilized by mods using the Fabric toolchain.

title: Sodium
description: The fastest and most compatible rendering optimization mod for Minecraft. Now available for both NeoForge and Fabric!

title: Cloth Config API
description: Configuration Library for Minecraft Mods

title: Iris Shaders
description: A modern shader pack loader for Minecraft intended to be compatible with existing OptiFine shader packs

title: Entity Culling
description: Using async path-tracing to hide Block-/Entities that are not visible

title: FerriteCore
description: Memory usage optimizations

title: Mod Menu
description: Adds a mod menu to view the list of mods you have installed.

title: Lithium
description: No-compromises game logic optimization mod. Well suited for clients and servers of all kinds. Now available for Fabric and NeoForge!

title: ImmediatelyFast
description: Speed up immediate mode rendering in Minecraft

title: YetAnotherConfigLib (YACL)
description: A builder-based configuration library for Minecraft.

title: Architectury API
description: An intermediary api aimed to ease developing multiplatform mods.

title: Fabric Language Kotlin
description: This is a mod that enables usage of the Kotlin programming language for Fabric mods.

title: Xaero's Minimap
description: Displays a map of the nearby world terrain, players, mobs, entities in the corner of your screen. Lets you create waypoints which help you find the locations you've marked.

title: Sodium Extra
description: A Sodium addon that adds features that shouldn't be in Sodium.

title: [ETF] Entity Texture Features
description: Emissive, Random & Custom texture support for entities in resourcepacks just like Optifine but for Fabric

title: ModernFix
description: All-in-one mod that improves performance, reduces memory usage, and fixes many bugs. Compatible with all your favorite performance mods!

title: AppleSkin
description: Food/hunger-related HUD improvements

title: Xaero's World Map
description: Adds a full screen world map which shows you what you have explored in the world. Works great together with Xaero's Minimap.

title: [EMF] Entity Model Features
description: EMF is an, OptiFine format, Custom Entity Model replacement mod available for Fabric and Forge.

title: Reese's Sodium Options
description: Alternative Options Menu for Sodium

title: Not Enough Animations
description: Bringing first-person animations to the third-person

title: Continuity
description: A Minecraft mod that allows for efficient connected textures

title: Dynamic FPS
description: Reduce resource usage while Minecraft is in the background, idle, or on battery.

title: Indium
description: Sodium addon providing support for the Fabric Rendering API, based on Indigo

title: Collective
description: üéì Collective is a shared library with common code for all of Serilum's mods.

title: 3D Skin Layers
description: Render the player skin layer in 3d!

title: No Chat Reports
description: Makes chat unreportable (where possible)

title: More Culling
description: A mod that changes how multiple types of culling are handled in order to improve performance

title: Simple Voice Chat
description: A working voice chat in Minecraft!

title: Jade üîç
description: Shows information about what you are looking at. (Hwyla/Waila fork for Minecraft 1.16+)

title: Zoomify
description: A zoom mod with infinite customizability.

title: Memory Leak Fix
description: A mod that fixes random memory leaks for both the client and server

title: Forge Config API Port
description: NeoForge's & Forge's config systems provided to other modding ecosystems. Designed for a multiloader architecture.

title: Puzzles Lib
description: Why it's called Puzzles, you ask? That's the puzzle!

title: Balm
description: Abstraction Layer for Multiplatform Mods

description: A 3D animation library for entities, blocks, items, armor, and more!

description: Just another boring library mod.

description: A Minecraft mod that provides realistic sound attenuation, reverberation, and absorption through blocks.

description: A core mod

title: Chat Heads
description: See who you're chatting with!

title: Model Gap Fix
description: Fixes gaps in Block Models and Item Models

description: Mine the whole vine on mining a single ore. Known feature by modpacks and pvp games like UHC (quick mine)

description: Reduces load times and adds fallbacks for languages
